thumb.name: Christmas Card List
thumb.verse: A decorative Christmas Card List is a must! It%26#146;s the perfect way to keep track of all your addresses. and when you sent each holiday card out!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E Paper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalize and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPersonalize%3C/b%3E the text. Select the text to write over it or change size. color. and font style.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EFor additional list pages. click %3Cb%3EAdd Page%3C/b%3E and follow the directions.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint Project%3C/b%3E to send finished Christmas card list to the printer.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project.
